name: Myconid Adult
lore: Myconid adults are the fully mature members of a myconid colony. They tend fungal crops, maintain the colony, and defend it when necessary, using their pacifying spores to subdue threats without violence whenever possible.

traits.name: Rapport Spores
traits.description: A creature that willingly inhales spores released by the myconid or that is a Myconid can communicate telepathically with the myconid, provided the creature and the myconid are within 30 feet of each other. The communication consists of shared emotions, basic ideas, and simple concepts.

actions.name: Fist
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d8) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Pacifying Spores
actions.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 11, one creature the myconid can see within 5 feet. Failure: The target has the Stunned condition for 1 minute. The target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

savingThrow.targets: one creature the myconid can see within 5 feet

onSuccess.effects: The effect ends on the target.

actions.name: Distress Spores
actions.description: Each Myconid within 240 feet of this myconid senses a distress signal from this myconid, learning the myconid's location and general emotional state.
